ygData.subject: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: I am suprised it hasn t started already. I just wanted to share with you my Post nerf FD experimentaion. Sol A green Flame goblins. the goblins I was
ygData.messageBody:
I am suprised it hasn't started already. I just wanted to share with you my Post nerf FD experimentaion.

Sol A green Flame goblins. the goblins I was experimenting with were on the floor near the passage to where the Foreman spawns. I succesfully feigned them at this point. they returned to thier spawn points . I stood up they immediatly came back. so I feign again they return to thier points I get up and run all the way to the small bridge type thing near the sol b spawn point. I fd again. I was several mins stand up wait a few and here they come a running at me. I fd again let them walk away. get up and they come back.

A fellow monk on my server experimented in Lguk with some Dar Undead frogs and had similar results even after 5 mins of feign time.


any other people doing experimentation out there?


Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 45th .....
E-Marr
Da`Kor
